mapper.insert: INSERT INTO [guacamole_user_history] (remote_host, user_id, username, start_date, end_date) VALUES ( #{record.remoteHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT user_id FROM [guacamole_user] JOIN [guacamole_entity] ON [guacamole_user].entity_id = [guacamole_entity].entity_id WHERE [guacamole_entity].name = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND [guacamole_entity].type = 'USER'), #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
